response.overview: An unmarried police officer, Nishaan Kaur , was appointed by her department to stop the adulteration black market in grocery items . Powerful bhopa sah running adulteration business with political support. Nishaan kaur's parents left her when she was a kid because they didn't want to grow a child . Nishaan kaur's grandfather raised nishaan kaur and helped her to become a police officer .nishana kaur did hard work to winning national athlete . In sports reservation she became police officer. Her grandfather pushed her to get married as soon as possible, but she is involved in cases of criminals all the time.
response.title: Kaur Is King
